entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

Pressure: 103.3 kPa
Humidity: 74 %

Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
